lead_paragraph: A disagreement occurred among lawmakers about the timing of a vote for a measure requiring lenders to keep at least 5 percent of the credit risk when they bundle and sell debt.

keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject

snippet: A disagreement occurred among lawmakers about the timing of a vote for a measure requiring lenders to keep at least 5 percent of the credit risk when they bundle and sell debt.

headline.main: At Hearing, a Dispute Over Banking Provision in Reform Law
